body_html: Thanks @gunan. I created tf_upgrade2.py because it used completely different approach to implement the upgrading script. I have been communication with @aselle in 7214 to see if he would accept this approach or not. Also, this method has not fully completed the functions in tf_update.py (upgrading a folder tree and creating log file)

body: Thanks @gunan. I created `tf_upgrade2.py` because it used completely different approach to implement the upgrading script. I have been communication with @aselle in [7214](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/7214) to see if he would accept this approach or not. Also, this method has not fully completed the functions in `tf_update.py` (upgrading a folder tree and creating log file)
